item.title: CSX CEO Highlights Importance Of Railroad Partnerships For Growth, Does Not Rule Out Merger As An Option
item.description: CSX Chief Joe Hinrichs stated that CSX is currently focused on its recent partnership with Berkshire Hathaway’s BNSF Railway.

item.title: Azitra Stock Scores Best Day In 7 Months After First Patient Dosed In Cancer-Linked Skin Rash Trial
item.description: The FDA has granted the program Fast Track status, aiming to address rashes that affect roughly 150,000 U.S. patients each year.

item.title: Trading Radar For August 28: Dr Reddy’s, United Breweries, Power Grid Corp, IndiGo Stocks Are On Investors’ Watchlist
item.description: All eyes are on key export sectors, including textiles, jewelry, and chemicals, as the 50% tariffs on Indian goods came into effect on Wednesday.
